DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study quantify difference joint mechanic different type walk healthy individual individual knee pathology . The investigator determine modify gait feedback and/or cutaneous stimulation change joint loading .
DOC.criteria: BMI < 35 kg/m^2 For knee pathology subject : Diagnosis knee pathology ( e.g . knee osteoarthritis , ACL injury , etc ) and/or knee pain Full weightbearing status Nonambulatory Use walk aid For healthy volunteer history surgical intervention joint low extremity Inability cooperate study protocol due medical psychiatric reason Inability provide inform consent For healthy subject : Any diagnosis knee osteoarthritis knee pain
